name: Arcade Adventure (Kevinskie)
description:
A fast paced platformer where you go from screen to screen. Every screen is a small, short level, and you play as a different character with different properties every screen. Your progress will be saved when you quit with ESC.

You will die in a single hit. Don't worry though! You will respawn in the same screen.

Controls:
W, A, S, D  -  Movement
Space          -  Jump/Action
Escape        -  Quit
Right-Alt    - Noclip cheat
